thread.section_title: Rome Style Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very nice and cozy
thread.title_full: Very nice and cozy - Review of Rome Style Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Radu Mihnea S
title: Very nice and cozy
text:
I spent three nights in Rome Style hotel together with my wife and son, end of February.
The reason we choseed this hotel was the location which is perfect if you want to be close to Piazza di Spagna but also to Fontana di Trevi or other important places to visit.
The hotel has a very small reception and restaurant but the staff us kind and supportive and the breakfast, eventough basic, is of good quality.
The room, small as well( but this is normal for such location in Rome), has a very efficient layout, a modern design and is very well equipped, everything in place and working perfectly, enough power sockets to charge your devices, water pressure excellent, etc. They also offer a first free minibar.
Well done!
